name: Caution Wet Floor
description:
Race to the top of the building to escape the flood. Play alone or with a friend and make your way up a procedurally generated building. The first one to reach the top, or the last one to drown, wins.

This game was created for the automn 2019 edition of the WonderJam. The theme of the event was a climatic catastrophe during the year 2119. The three imposed styles were arcade, survival and racing.
